definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Take a walk through the park on Zhongshan Road.
The old bus bumped along the mountain road.
sentences.chinese: 舊公共汽車沿著山路顛簸行駛。

sentences.english: B: Oh, yes, thanks. I'm looking for Zhong Shan Road.
sentences.chinese: 哦，是的，謝謝，我在找中山路。

sentences.english: One should bring a flashlight when walking in mountains at night.
sentences.chinese: 夜裏走山路，應該帶上電棒兒。

sentences.english: The comb-shape road The zigzag road looks like a comb from afar.
sentences.chinese: 《木梳路段》蜿蜒曲折的山路形狀像梳子一樣。

sentences.english: I walked down the hill into town, ignoring the flashes of lightning all round me.
sentences.chinese: 我顧不上一路的電閃雷鳴，沿着山路向市區走去。

sentences.english: My feet were blistered from walking on mountain paths all day.
sentences.chinese: 走了一天的山路，腳上都打泡了。

sentences.english: This mountainside was unfrequented all day.
sentences.chinese: 這是一條人跡罕至的山路。

sentences.english: But looking ahead, I found there's nothing but street lamps at the turn of mountain path.
sentences.chinese: 我擡頭望時，確是山路轉折處的路燈。

sentences.english: Shanghai Portrait France who prefer the bars on Hengshan cleavage sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 上海人像法國人，偏愛衡山路上的酒吧劈情操。

sentences.english: My house lies at Shandong, Qingdao, Zhongshan Road.
sentences.chinese: 我家在山東省青島市中山路。

sentences.english: Walk along Zhongshan Road, and turn right at the second crossing.
sentences.chinese: 沿着中山路走，在第二個十字路口往右拐。

sentences.english: Zhong Shan Road is a busy street.
sentences.chinese: 中山路是一條熱鬧的街道。

sentences.english: Once the lens turn and a devil with disgustingly dirty whole body appear on the hill path.
sentences.chinese: 鏡頭一轉，一個渾身髒兮兮的妖怪出現在山路上。

sentences.english: The design of Zhangmiao Exercise Park shows our attitude towards the city.
sentences.chinese: 上海寶山路運動公園展示了我們對城市的態度。

definition: road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job
to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
to go uphill/to spin cocoon (silkworms)/to pass away
uphill/upslope/to move upwards/to climb a slope
